title: Their homes burned in the LA wildfires. A year later, thousands still can’t return
description: Seven in 10 residents who were forced to leave have not returned, with many living in temporary housing in other cities or even countries
content: Esmeralda Rodas sits on the ground in front of what was once the front door of her home, haunted by memories of her previous life. She remembers jumping for joy in 1989, when her husband, Hector Roda… [+8620 chars]
de: Ihre Häuser brannten bei den Waldbränden in LA. Ein Jahr später können Tausende immer noch nicht zurückkehren. Sieben von zehn Bewohnern, die das Land verlassen mussten, sind nicht zurückgekehrt, viele leben in provisorischen Unterkünften in anderen Städten oder sogar Ländern
en: Their homes burned in the LA wildfires. A year later, thousands still can’t return. Seven in 10 residents who were forced to leave have not returned, with many living in temporary housing in other cities or even countries
la: Domes eorum in LA wildfires ardebant. Post annum, milia adhuc redire non possunt. Septem in 10 habitant qui relinquere coacti non sunt reversi, cum multi in aliis civitatibus vel etiam regionibus commorationem temporalem habitantium

title: Extreme weather coupled with high fire risk leaves Xcel Energy with no easy choices (Opinion)
description: While it’s not possible to estimate the exact damage that could have occurred had these lines been energized, the conditions at the time suggest that any ignition had the potential to become a catastrophic fire.
content: As extreme weather intensifies across the globe, wildfires have become a growing and well-documented threat to Colorados communities. Some areas of the state now experience 50 additional fire-weather… [+4215 chars]
de: Extremes Wetter gepaart mit hoher Brandgefahr lässt Xcel Energy keine einfachen Entscheidungen (Meinung). Obwohl es nicht möglich ist, den genauen Schaden abzuschätzen, der hätte entstehen können, wenn diese Leitungen unter Strom stünden, deuten die damaligen Bedingungen darauf hin, dass jede Entzündung zu einem katastrophalen Brand führen könnte.
en: Extreme weather coupled with high fire risk leaves Xcel Energy with no easy choices (Opinion). While it’s not possible to estimate the exact damage that could have occurred had these lines been energized, the conditions at the time suggest that any ignition had the potential to become a catastrophic fire.
la: Extrema tempestas cum magno igne periculo copulata relinquit Xcel Energy cum non facile electiones (Opinio). Dum non potest aestimare damnum exiguum quod fieri potuit, si hae lineae factae sunt, condiciones tempore suggerunt ullam ignitionem vim habuisse ut incendium catastrophicum fieri possit.

de: Wirtschaftsupdate zu Waldbränden: Der Wiederaufbau der Nachfrage folgt auf erhebliche Verluste. Das Los Angeles County Department of Economic Opportunity (DEO) und das Institute for Applied Economics der Los Angeles County Economic Development Corporation (LAEDC) veranstalteten das zweite öffentliche Webinar in einer vierteiligen Reihe, in der die wirtschaftlichen Auswirkungen der … untersucht wurden.
en: Wildfire Economic Update: Rebuilding demand follows significant losses. The Los Angeles County Department of Economic Opportunity (DEO) and the Los Angeles County Economic Development Corporation (LAEDC)’s Institute for Applied Economics hosted the second public webinar in a four-part series examining the economic impacts of the …
la: INCAENDIUM Oeconomicum Renovatio: Reaedificationis postulatio sequitur damna significantia. Comitatus Los Angeles Department of Oeconomica Opportunitatis (DEO) et Los Angeles Comitatus conomica Development Corporation (LAEDC) Institutum oeconomiae applicatae hosted in secunda serie publica webinar in quattuor seriei explorandi impulsus oeconomicos ...

title: Austerity hinders fight against wildfires in Argentina’s Patagonia
description: Criticism grows as Milei's austerity cuts have reduced Argentina's fire management budget despite wildfire crisis.
content: Wildfires are sweeping through Argentinas Patagonia region, consuming more than 450sq km (175sq miles) of native forests, including parts of the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Los Alerces National Par… [+1426 chars]
de: Sparmaßnahmen behindern den Kampf gegen Waldbrände im argentinischen Patagonien. Die Kritik wächst, da Mileis Sparmaßnahmen trotz der Waldbrandkrise Argentiniens Budget für die Brandbekämpfung gekürzt haben.
en: Austerity hinders fight against wildfires in Argentina’s Patagonia. Criticism grows as Milei's austerity cuts have reduced Argentina's fire management budget despite wildfire crisis.
la: austeritas pugnare contra ignes in Patagonia Argentinae impedit. Discrimen crescit sicut austeritas Milei secat in administratione oeconomiae ignis Argentinae redegisse non obstante discrimine ignis feralis.
